name: social-media-automation
description: 自媒体自动化运营系统 - 专业的多平台内容发布工具

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start:production: npm run build:all && npm run start
scripts.package: npm run build:all && cd packages/backend && npm run package
scripts.package:mac: npm run build:all && cd packages/backend && npm run package:mac
scripts.package:win: npm run build:all && cd packages/backend && npm run package:win
scripts.package:linux: npm run build:all && cd packages/backend && npm run package:linux
scripts.clean:all: cd packages/shared && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && npm run clean
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
